scripts.branch-deploy: npm run doc && npm run branch-deploy:sandbox && npx netlify deploy --auth $BRANCHDEPLOY_AUTH_TOKEN --site $BRANCHDEPLOY_SITE_ID --alias $ZUUL_CHANGE --dir packages/codex-docs/docs/.vitepress/dist
scripts.branch-deploy:sandbox: npm run -w @wikimedia/codex build-sandbox && cp -r packages/codex/dist/sandbox packages/codex-docs/docs/.vitepress/dist/
scripts.coverage: npm run build-all-if-missing && mkdir -p coverage && npm run test:unit -w @wikimedia/codex -- --coverageDirectory=../../coverage
scripts.dev: npm run build-if-missing -w @wikimedia/codex-icons && concurrently "npm run watch -w @wikimedia/codex-design-tokens" "npm run dev -w @wikimedia/codex"
scripts.doc: npm run build -w @wikimedia/codex-icons && npm run build -w @wikimedia/codex-design-tokens && npm run build -w @wikimedia/codex && npm run build -w codex-docs
scripts.doc:dev: npm run build-if-missing -w @wikimedia/codex-icons  && concurrently "npm run watch -w @wikimedia/codex-design-tokens" "npm run dev -w codex-docs"
scripts.lint: npm run lint:eslint && npm run lint:stylelint && npm run lint --workspaces --if-present
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run test --workspaces --if-present && ./build/diff-css.sh
scripts.build-and-update-snapshots: npm run build-all && npm run update-snapshots --workspaces --if-present
